data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,373 believers in Ras Al-Khaimah to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 114,627 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ras Al-Khaimah, United Arab Emirates
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 1,373 believers in Ras Al-Khaimah to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Ras Al-Khaimah, United Arab Emirates.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Ras Al-Khaimah do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Baloch, Southern people might believe through him.
Spirit, please defend the 1,373 believers in Ras Al-Khaimah against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, we ask for 23 new simple churches in the state of Ras Al-Khaimah, United Arab Emirates. Place a simple church in every community of the 116,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Ras Al-Khaimah prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Ras Al-Khaimah
